alert.note: Alert for Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Northern Monterey Bay; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose; Santa Cruz Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 14 at 6:13PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Santa Cruz and southeastern Santa Clara Counties through 645 PM PST... At 612 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brown Valley Road, or near Corralitos, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Jose, Watsonville, Gilroy, Morgan Hill, Corralitos, Brown Valley Road, Freedom, Eureka Canyon Road, Uvas Canyon Park, Amesti, Interlaken, San Martin, Aptos Hills-Larkin Valley, Aptos Hills-Larkin and Day Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Northern Monterey Bay; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose; Santa Cruz Mountains
